mapper.update: update key_result set description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, objective_id = #{objectiveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disabled = #{disabled,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, description, name, objective_id, disabled, create_time from key_result
